data.title: TheFutonCritic.com - The Web's Best Television Resource
data.text:
[08/14/24 - 02:32 PM]

Madison Iseman Cast in the Upcoming USA Network Drama Series "The Rainmaker"

She'll play Sarah Plankmore, Rudy's girlfriend and a recent law school graduate.

[08/14/24 - 02:32 PM]

First Look at Mitford Sisters Series "Outrageous" Starring Bessie Carter

Carter plays Nancy Mitford in the six-part series that will premiere on BritBox North America in 2025.

[08/14/24 - 01:03 PM]

Alex Guarnaschelli Signs New Multi-Year Deal with Food Network

"Food Network has been my extended family for as long as I can remember, and the thought that I get to continue to have the opportunity to create so much fun and delicious content and memories is something I will continue to cherish," said Guarnaschelli.

[08/14/24 - 12:13 PM]

Comedy Central Adds "Family Guy" to Its Robust Adult Animation Lineup

The iconic series is set to launch with an all-day marathon on Labor Day, Monday, September 2, and will join the primetime lineup starting on Tuesday, September 3, solidifying its position as a cornerstone of the brand's programming.

[08/14/24 - 12:00 PM]

"48 Hours," A Free, 24/7 Streaming Network, Launches Today on New Platforms

This channel will continue to be available on Paramount's leading FAST service Pluto TV.

[08/14/24 - 11:10 AM]

The CW Network to Debut New Wild West Unscripted Series "The Wranglers" This Fall

The new unscripted series, which follows the personal and professional lives of young staff members working at the Circle Bar Dude Ranch in Montana, will premiere on Thursday, October 24.

[08/14/24 - 10:04 AM]

Sandro Rosta to Star in the Paramount+ Original Series "Star Trek: Starfleet Academy"

Rosta joins the previously announced cast of cadets: Kerrice Brooks, Bella Shepard, George Hawkins, Karim Diané and Zoë Steiner, as well as Holly Hunter, who plays the captain and chancellor of Starfleet Academy.

[08/14/24 - 10:01 AM]

"Heels" Is Coming to Netflix in the U.S. on September 15

Both seasons of the series starring starring Stephen Amell and Alexander Ludwig are heading to the streaming service.

[08/14/24 - 09:31 AM]

Video: Peacock Kicks Off College Football Season with the Trailer Release for Original Sports Docuseries "Here Come the Irish"

The series documents life on and off the field of the legendary University of Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team through exclusive behind-the-scenes footage and interviews with those closest to the program.

[08/14/24 - 09:31 AM]

Video: "American Sports Story: Aaron Hernandez" - Official Trailer - Josh Rivera, Ryan Murphy - FX

The 10-episode limited series charts the rise and fall of NFL superstar Aaron Hernandez and explores the disparate strands of his identity, his family, his career, his suicide and their legacy in sports and American culture.

[08/14/24 - 09:00 AM]

CBS Media Ventures New Game Show "Flip Side" with Host Jaleel White to Premiere Sept. 9 in National Syndication

The exciting, easy to play-along game show pits two teams of players against each other to test them on how they think two different groups of people feel about the same issue.

[08/14/24 - 08:37 AM]

Video: Peacock Releases Official Teaser for Horror-Thriller Series "Teacup"

The series follows a disparate group of people in rural Georgia who must come together in the face of a mysterious threat in order to survive.

[08/14/24 - 08:31 AM]

Video: "The Circle" Season 7 - Official Trailer - Netflix

Clever catfish, shady tactics and game-changing twists collide as a new group of players competes for $100,000 in the most cutthroat season to date.

[08/14/24 - 08:01 AM]

Investigation Discovery Slates Three New Series for September Premieres

"How (Not) To Get Rid of a Body," "The Real Murders on Elm Street" and "Cabin in the Woods" are all on tap in the coming weeks.

[08/14/24 - 08:00 AM]

Video: Trailer and Key Art Debut - Hulu Original Series "The Secret Life of Mormon Wives"

The series premieres with all eight episodes on Friday, September 6 on Hulu.

[08/14/24 - 07:57 AM]

AXS TV Broadcasts Ameripolitan Music Awards on Sunday, August 18 at 1 p.m. ET

The exclusive event was taped at the iconic Austin City Limits (ACL) Moody Theater during the 10th Annual Ameripolitan Awards show on February 18.

[08/14/24 - 07:03 AM]

Acclaimed Drama "Sherwood" Returns November 14 on BritBox

The first season of the BAFTA-nominated series was one of the most watched shows in the UK, and the second season is a suspense-filled follow-up, driven by an all-star cast of celebrated British actors.

[08/14/24 - 07:02 AM]

Netflix Renews "The Gentlemen" for Season 2

Theo James, Kaya Scodelario and Daniel Ings will all reprise their roles in the new season.

[08/14/24 - 07:01 AM]

Peacock Picks Up Two Additional Seasons of the Hit Competition Series "The Traitors" on the Heels of Its Four Primetime Emmy Nominations

The hit series brings together the dramatic stylings of fashion icon Alan Cumming with the deceit and treachery of a celeb-fueled competition set in the Scottish Highlands.

[08/14/24 - 07:01 AM]

The New Comedy Series "Envious", Made in Argentina, and Starring Griselda Siciliani Along with a Great Cast, Will Premiere Globally on Netflix on September 18

When her friends start getting married, Vicky splits up with her commitment-phobic long-term boyfriend to find someone who will fulfill her dream of... being married.

[08/14/24 - 07:01 AM]

HBO Reveals Official Character Posters from "City of God: The Fight Rages On"

The plot is a sequel adapted from the literary work of Paulo Lins and is set in the early 2000s, twenty years after the events of the movie.

[08/14/24 - 07:00 AM]

Video: War Has Come to Middle-Earth as Prime Video's "The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power" Foreshadows Season Two's Return of Sauron with New Trailer Featuring the Action-Packed, Legendary Siege of Eregion

Season two debuts with the first three episodes on August 29, and additional new episodes streaming each week.

[08/14/24 - 06:32 AM]

Noah Eagle, Todd Blackledge and Kaylee Hartung to Call Eagles-Packers NFL Friday Night Opening Weekend Game from Sao Paulo, Brazil on Sept. 6 Exclusively on Peacock

Packers-Eagles marks the third Peacock exclusive NFL game, following the Bills-Chargers regular season game in December 2023 and the Dolphins-Chiefs AFC Wild Card game in January 2024, which was the biggest live-streamed event in U.S. history.

[08/14/24 - 06:00 AM]

Hallmark+ Launches September 10th with Premieres of "The Chicken Sisters" and "Celebrations with Lacey Chabert" and More

Other premieres include the "Love on the Danube" movie trilogy and three new installments of "The Jane Mysteries."

[08/14/24 - 05:35 AM]

Voting Begins Today for 2024 "People's Choice Country Awards"

To celebrate the best in country music, fans can now vote for their favorite nominees across 18 categories, which have expanded this year to include Female Song, Male Song, Group / Duo Song, Cover Song, New Artist Song and Storyteller Song.

[08/14/24 - 04:01 AM]

Netflix Reveals Launch Date and Debuts First Look Images for Highly Anticipated Swedish Series "The Helicopter Heist"

Based on true events, the action thriller series - due on November 22 - tells the story of the meticulous planning, ingenuity, and nerve that went into pulling off one of the most daring crimes in history.

[08/13/24 - 10:31 PM]

Netflix and Pritish Nandy Communications Reimagine Regal Romances with "The Royals", Starring Bhumi Pednekar and Ishaan Khatter

Sakshi Tanwar, Nora Fatehi, Dino Morea, Milind Soman, Chunky Panday, Vihaan Samat, Kavya Trehan, Sumukhi Suresh, Udit Arora, Lisa Mishra and Luke Kenny round out this ensemble.

[08/13/24 - 04:01 PM]

Video: "The Queen of Villains" - Official Teaser - Netflix

Set in the wild '80s, a kind-hearted girl transforms into a bloodthirsty pro wrestler who thrives in chaotic brawls, turning an entire nation against her.

[08/13/24 - 01:30 PM]

New FYI Series "Global Soul Kitchen" Premieres on Monday, September 2

Best-selling author and chef Deborah VanTrece introduces viewers to "global soul food," a style of cooking that combines traditional Southern American soul food with different international influences to create something both familiar and new.

[08/13/24 - 12:04 PM]

AMC Netwoks Sets Premiere Date for Riveting True Crime Docu-Series "The Tailor of Sin City"

The four-part series, due on September 12, is a star-studded, sequin-filled, stranger-than-fiction story of how a gifted smalltown tailor, AJ Pratt, built a drug and fashion empire in the heart of Sin City.

[08/13/24 - 12:01 PM]

Netflix Top 10 Week of Aug. 5: "Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie," "A Good Girl's Guide to Murder" and "Elite" Hold Top Spots

The highly anticipated fourth and final season of "The Umbrella Academy," based on the beloved Dark Horse comic book series and starring our favorite dysfunctional family, returned to claim the #2 spot on the English TV List with 8.4M views.

[08/13/24 - 10:19 AM]

Back-to-School with Netflix's Kids & Family Fall Lineup of New and Returning Series and Films

This fall ushers in the debut of new series including "Mighty MonsterWheelies," "Barbie Mysteries: The Great Horse Chase," "Jentry Chau vs. the Underworld" and "Our Oceans" joining a robust line up of returning fan favorite shows like "Gabby's Dollhouse," "Hot Wheels Let's Race" and "Jurassic World: Chaos Theory."

[08/13/24 - 10:08 AM]

Bravo Is in an Empire State of Mind When "The Real Housewives of New York City" Returns Tuesday, Oct. 1 at 9 P.M. ET/PT

Sai De Silva, Ubah Hassan, Erin Lichy, Jenna Lyons, Jessel Taank and Brynn Whitfield all return this season, along with new housewife, Racquel Chevremont and Rebecca Minkoff, who joins as a friend.

[08/13/24 - 10:05 AM]

AMC+ And Sundance Now Announce Second Season of Enchanting Drama "Sanctuary: A Witch's Tale"

The six-episode second season of the original series is scheduled to begin filming this month in Ireland and will debut in 2025.

[08/13/24 - 10:02 AM]

Food Network's Epic Halloween Programming Returns This September with Fan-Favorite Series and All-New Specials

Last year, with more than 28 million viewers watching its Halloween lineup, Food Network was a top 5 non-news/sports cable network among adults during September and October.

[08/13/24 - 10:00 AM]

A24's "Civil War" and "I Saw the TV Glow" Begin Streaming Exclusively on Max This September

Look for said films on September 13 and September 20, respectively.

[08/13/24 - 09:41 AM]

"Penelope," A Series from Mark Duplass & Mel Eslyn, Is Coming to Netflix in the U.S. September 24

Feeling out of place in society, Penelope is drawn into the wilderness where she forms a new life for herself.

[08/13/24 - 09:32 AM]

FX's "Grotesquerie" Sets Premiere Date and Releases Key Art

The 10-episode first season will premiere on Wednesday, September 25 at 10 p.m. ET/PT on FX and stream the next day on Hulu.

[08/13/24 - 09:02 AM]

The Men of "The Golden Bachelorette" Prove That Age Is Just a Number and Romance Is Timeless

This fall, 24 distinguished men in their golden era will step into the spotlight, eager to find an everlasting love with Joan Vassos when "The Golden Bachelorette" premieres Wednesday, September 18 on ABC.

[08/13/24 - 09:01 AM]

Netflix Goes "Live from the Other Side with Tyler Henry" - New Live Weekly Show with America's #1 Medium That Bridges Two Worlds Together

Starting September 17, a new episode will stream live every Tuesday at 3pm PT, exclusively on Netflix.

[08/13/24 - 09:00 AM]

Video: Trailer Debut - Hulu Original Series "Only Murders in the Building" Season Four

In season four of "Only Murders in the Building," Charles, Oliver & Mabel wrestle with the shocking events at the end of season three surrounding Charles' stunt double & friend Sazz Pataki.

[08/13/24 - 08:36 AM]

Peacock Renews "Love Island Games" for a Second Season Ahead of Upcoming Reunion for Breakout Hit "Love Island USA"

The recent sixth season of Peacock's "Love Island USA" was the #1 most-watched streaming original reality series in the U.S. with over 1 billion minutes watched, according to Nielsen.

[08/13/24 - 08:01 AM]

TLC's Hit Series, "Sister Wives" Returns Sunday, September 15 at 10PM ET/PT

Kody, Meri, Janelle, Christine, and Robyn continue to share a genuine glimpse into the complexities of their relationships, moving forward as best as they can for themselves and one another.

[08/13/24 - 08:01 AM]

Video: "Hot Wheels Let's Race" Season 2 Sneak Peek - Netflix Jr

The heat is on as the Hot Wheels kids race to save the Ultimate Garage from a flashy new challenger who's driving a car loaded with special powers!

[08/13/24 - 07:31 AM]

Video: "Selling Sunset" Season 8 - Official Trailer - Netflix

Glam looks. Fierce clashes. Stunning homes. It's business as usual for The Oppenheim Group as they welcome a new agent and bid farewell to a dear friend.

[08/13/24 - 07:29 AM]

Prime Video Releases First-Look Images and Premiere Date for "A Very Royal Scandal" Starring Michael Sheen and Ruth Wilson

All three episodes premiere on September 19 on Prime Video.

[08/13/24 - 07:01 AM]

"Supacell" Season 2 Is Coming

Netflix confirmed the news on social media this morning.

[08/13/24 - 07:01 AM]

Video: "Elisabeth Rioux: Unfiltered" - Official Trailer - Prime Video

Her world is bigger than what's on the feed.

[08/13/24 - 07:00 AM]

Apple TV+ Announces New Season of Emmy-Nominated Motorbike Adventure Series

The all-new 10-episode season reunites best friends Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman for their next great motorbike tour, this time a little closer to home.
